node.title: 'Like another world': Aurora australis seen over Tasmania was 'hands-down best' in years
node.alt: Purple and yellow lights on the horizon from the top of a mountain.
node.description: Tasmanians were treated to a spectacular show from the aurora australis last night, with viewers describing it as "the best and strongest" they had seen in years.
node.content:
["Tasmanians were treated to a spectacular show of the aurora australis last night, with viewers describing it as \"the best and strongest\" they had seen in years.", "The aurora is a natural display of lights in the sky \u2014\u00a0appearing as rays, curtains, flickers or spirals. It's usually seen around the Antarctic and Arctic regions.", "The Bureau of Meteorology has describes it as \"one of nature's most spectacular visual phenomenons\", taking place when \"favourable\" space weather activity occurs.", "It hit last night\u00a0and was visible in areas across the state: in Blackman's Bay and Clifton Beach near Hobart, in Launceston and Devonport in the north,\u00a0in Ross in the east and in Queenstown in the west.", "Sam Deighton captured a two-hour timelapse of the aurora, looking out over Hobart's southern suburbs.", "\"She went absolutely wild\u00a0just after the last light of sunset disappeared.\"", "", "
The aurora is a natural display of lights in the sky.(Instagram: azra_lee_photography)
", "", "
The aurora australis lights up the night sky.(Instagram: Deni Cupit)
", "Photographer Deni Cupit snapped the aurora and said: \"Last night looked like another world.\"", "Carmel Gledhill said you could see the aurora with the naked eye, \"all you had to do is look south\".", "Ms Gledhill was on top of kunanyi/Mt Wellington, where she saw \"hands down the best and strongest aurora\" she'd seen in \"years\".", "If you missed last night's aurora you can subscribe to alerts from the BOM here.", "", "
The aurora appears as a 'curtain'.(Instagram: nick.in.tas)
"]
